chapter.name: Delicious Tutorials: Step Sequencer
chapter.indexinfo: Building a simple, polyphonic step sequencer
chapter.p: Hello World. If you were trying to learn one of the hip new programming languages like Malbolge or Lithp or Jorvascrapt, the first thing you might try to do would be to print these two words to the screen. Max is better than a programming language, though, so instead of printing words we're going to make music
